item.title: OR-Toolformer: Modeling and Solving Operations Research Problems with Tool Augmented Large Language Models
item.description: arXiv:2510.01253v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: Large language models (LLMs) demonstrate strong mathematical reasoning, but reliance on closed-source APIs for OR tasks raises privacy concerns, and training open-source models from scratch incurs high compute costs. We introduce OR-Toolformer, which ...<br><br><small><strong>Source:</strong> arXiv | <strong>Keywords:</strong> augmented, zero-shot, tool, API, large language model | <strong>Relevance:</strong> 100%</small>
item.author: noreply@contextengineering.news (arXiv)

item.title: Retrieval-Augmented Framework for LLM-Based Clinical Decision Support
item.description: arXiv:2510.01363v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: The increasing complexity of clinical decision-making, alongside the rapid expansion of electronic health records (EHR), presents both opportunities and challenges for delivering data-informed care. This paper proposes a clinical decision support syst...<br><br><small><strong>Source:</strong> arXiv | <strong>Keywords:</strong> augmented, tool, API, alignment, large language model | <strong>Relevance:</strong> 100%</small>

item.title: Fine-tuning with RAG for Improving LLM Learning of New Skills
item.description: arXiv:2510.01375v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: Large language model (LLM) agents deployed for multi-step tasks frequently fail in predictable ways: attempting actions with unmet preconditions, issuing redundant commands, or mishandling environment constraints. While retrieval-augmented generation ...<br><br><small><strong>Source:</strong> arXiv | <strong>Keywords:</strong> augmented, large language model, retrieval, LLM, arxiv | <strong>Relevance:</strong> 100%</small>

item.title: KAG - KAG is a logical form-guided reasoning and retrieval framework based on OpenSPG engine and LLMs. It is used to build logical reasoning and factual Q&A solutions for professional domain knowledge bases. It can effectively overcome the shortcomings of the traditional RAG vector similarity calculation model.
item.description: KAG is a logical form-guided reasoning and retrieval framework based on OpenSPG engine and LLMs. It is used to build logical reasoning and factual Q&A solutions for professional domain knowledge bases. It can effectively overcome the shortcomings of the traditional RAG vector similarity calculation model.<br><br><small><strong>Source:</strong> GitHub | <strong>Keywords:</strong> knowledge base, reasoning, framework, retrieval, LLM | <strong>Relevance:</strong> 100%</small>
